content: संगीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Sung together, sung in chorus. --तं {@--1@} Chorus, a song sung by many voices; जगुः सुकंठ्यो गंधर्व्यः संगीतं सहभर्तृकाः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--2@} Music, harmonious singing, especially singing accompanied by instrumental music and dancing, triple symphony; गीतं वाद्यं नर्तनं च त्रयं संगीतमुच्यते; किमन्यदस्याः परिषदः श्रुतिप्रसादनतः संगीतात् <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Mk. 1.</ls> {@--3@} A concert. {@--4@} The art of singing with music and dancing; <ls>Bh. 2. 12.</ls>
